metaDescription: This is Arthur's portfolio website. Currently I study computer science at Tokyo Tech. You can view what I've created, especially web apps.

list.description: Tokyo Institute of Technology, Bachelor of Engineering

currentAffiliation.title: Affiliation
list: Public Address Team, Joint Concert of High School Band Clubs in Shizuoka

formerAffiliation.title: Former Affiliation
list: Network Team, Tokyo Tech Festival Executive Committee
Staff, School of Computing Freshman Seminar, Tokyo Tech

awards.title: Awards and Activities
list: Global System Development Training in the Philippines (Education Program for Leading Information Technology Specialists), Tokyo Tech (2020)
Grand Prix, Workshop on System Implementation (Web Programming), Tokyo Tech (2020)
Grand Prix and Special Prizes, Summer Camp on Team-based Software Development, enPiT AiBiC (2019)

koudaisai2016.title: Tokyo Tech Festival 2016 Official Website
koudaisai2016.description: Mainly I was responsible for the development of back-end. I also created the web map of stalls using Google Map.

koudaisai2017.title: Tokyo Tech Festival 2017 Official Website
koudaisai2017.description: I designed the REST API of organizations' information. I also developed the new web system to vote for Grandprix.

goukakuJizi.title: Supporting Examinees Website by JIZI
goukakuJizi.description: The website that provides information for examinees has launched. I was responsible for design, front-end and back-end. I didn't use JavaScript for implementing UI.

titechAppProject.title: Titech App Project Website
titechAppProject.description: It is a website of the circle which develops apps for Tokyo Tech students. I was responsible for the front-end development.

buratsukiPortal.title: Perpetual Students' Portal
buratsukiPortal.description: It is a score management tool for the board game "Agricola".

agricolaBook.title: Special lecture: Expansions of Agricola + Randomizer for Agricola
agricolaBook.description: I published the fanzine of the board game "Agricola" at the Game Market 2018 Autumn. I also provided the randomizer app as a promo.

tokyoKoryo.title: Tokyo Koryo Alumni Association Website
tokyoKoryo.description: I reconstructed the website of Tokyo Koryo Alumi Association.

internalSpace.title: Internal Space Website
internalSpace.description: I developed the website of the art team "Internal Space".

reborn.title: Re:born -You will be Back to the Fetus, Go through the Birth Canal and Reborn-
reborn.description: It was the work for 27th International collegiate Virtual Reality Contest (IVRC 2019). I developed the system which integrated a camera, a computer for machine learning and a display.

lifeGame.title: Life Game Simulator
lifeGame.description: It was a work for the event of Sci-Fi Society in Tokyo Tech Festival 2019. The exhibition was cancelled because of Typhoon Hagibis.

gachiproOfSysimpl.title: Fully understand the exam schedule
gachiproOfSysimpl.description: In the course of Workshop on System Implementation [CSC.T375], we developed an app for searching information of final exams. I was the project manager and a front-end developer.

nationalEconomy.title: National Economy Online
nationalEconomy.description: It is the 1st work as Stay Home Project. I developed a web application for playing the board game "National Economy" online.

agriCompanion.title: AgriCompanion
agriCompanion.description: It is the 2nd work as Stay Home Project. I developed a web application for playing the board game "Agricola" online. You can draft and manage your cards with the app.

shirenInpasu.title: Shiren Inpasu
shirenInpasu.description: "Shiren Inpasu" is a web app to identify items for the Rogue-like game series "Shiren the Wanderer". It was developed based on "Shiren Identifier", which I made in 2018.

publications.title: Papers and Publications
list: Shoko Kimura, Ayaka Fujii, Kenichi Ito, Kazuki Asakura, Rihito Tsuboi and Kazunori Miyata. Into the Womb -Born Again- A VR Experience of Being Warmly Swaddled Using "Otonamaki" from Japanese Method. ConVRgence (VRIC) Virtual Reality International Conference 2020, pages 169-171, April 2020.

Shoko Kimura, Ayaka Fujii, Hiroyuki Hoshi, Rei Tamaru, Ryoma Miyauchi, Kazuki Asakura, Akihiro Suzuki, Rihito Tsuboi. Re:born -You will be Back to the Fetus, Go through the Birth Canal and Reborn-. The Virtual Reality Society of Japan Conference Proceedings, 24:2B-04, Sep 2019.
Kazuki Asakura. Linguistic Feature of Popular Songs in Karaoke. Poster Session of Linguistics B [LAH.T210], Jul 2019.

music.title: Music
music.description: I listen to music widely. Especially I like club music and 80's J-POP.

videoGames.title: Video Games
videoGames.description: I like old video game hardware such as Nintendo 64.

boardGames.title: Board Games
boardGames.description: My highest ELO of Agricola is 1926. (Boîte à Jeux)
